post.body: Downloading fonts. Did I mention how much I LOVE fonts??? Lol
A day off??? What's that??? You mean it's RIGHT NOW??? How comwe no one told me??? Dangit!
TOO DANG tired to even Tweet! In mid run of rehearsal/performances...too...tired...to...think...(My best Capt Kirk there, ya like???) LOL!
Relaxing after tonight's rehearsal and wondering how Mikey and Nando can remember SOOoooo many movie lines! I mean SERIOUSLY!!!
Txt'ing Mikey about my metal bodied Dobro. He is cleaning it for me. What a bud, eh?!? WAIT...did he just say there were scratches??? WT...
Watching gruesome vids on utube with Mikey! Nastay!!!
Moping around.
Rehearsal!!! Rehearsal!!! REHEARSAL!!! Ugh!!!
Waiting for my youngins to finish eating lunch... Man, they take F O R E V E R!!!
Just got off the phone with Mikey; he is hm and resting up... Yea!!! Thank God!
Waiting for the end of dance class. Can we say B O R I N G???
Just finishd wrt'ng An Immortal Love. The Mendonca Boys tick me off & out comes a song. Unforeseen formula? Hey, I ain't knockin' it!!! Lol
Waking up is hard to do... Why do my chittlins wake w/ the friggin' sun???
Just finished Mass w/ Glorious & my band - they rocked the HOUSE!!! YEAH BOOOOYEEE!!!
Believing that a Kindi Thnxgvn feast should NOT, I repeat, NOT be more work than the real deal, EVER!!!
Checkin' out some new tunes and some old classics.
Blogging...is that so wrong???
Trying to make Wendnesday a lazy day...ain't working so far, dagnabit!!! LOL
Trying to stay awake at almost 5 in the evening. So sad! = )
That would be 30 MINUTES ago. Can you tell I'm tired?!? lol
Just finished last Advent Mass... It was tight!!! Once again, my girls rocked the house! As did my guys.
Waitin' on Mikey for dinner & rehearsal...as usual! Lol
